items.title: An Enthralling Trip to Ancient Egypt
items.description: Mara, Daughter of the Nile is a thrilling summer read.

items.title: GOP Governors Lead Charge on Nixing Sugary Snacks from SNAP Benefits
items.description: Indiana is one of six Republican-led states to whom USDA officials granted SNAP waivers for sugary foods under the waiver authority of the Food Nutrit...

items.title: The Media Are Doing Free PR for Accused Criminals Caught in ICE Raids
items.description: Many news reports on immigration-enforcement actions bury key information about apprehended individuals so deep that it’s next to dinosaur bones.

items.title: We Have to Save Childhood
items.description: The modern onslaught against childhood ought to inspire the rest of us to do what we can to preserve or reclaim its essential aspects.

items.title: Russiagate Revisited: Trump CIA Chief Refers Brennan and Comey for Criminal Investigation
items.description: It’s well established that the Trump-Russia hoax was concocted to harm Trump, but Ratcliffe’s move is a prosecutorial dead end.
